content:
The Proterra Catalyst E2 and the Proterra Catalyst XR are both equipped with Proterra's proprietary battery technology, called the E2 Max. According to Proterra, the E2 Max battery system has a capacity of 660 kilowatt-hours (kWh) for the E2 model, and XR model has a capacity of 440 kWh, which enables the buses to have a range of up to 660 miles on a single charge for E2 model and up to 350 miles on a single charge for XR model.
It should be noted that the range of the bus can be influenced by various factors such as weight of the bus, load, weather, road condition and driving style, so the actual range may vary.
